tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE chatbot_conversations (
    conversation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID NOT NULL,
    bot_id UUID NOT NULL,
    message TEXT NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE conversations (
    conversation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    chatbot_id INT,
    message TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE conversation_logs (conversation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
user_id UUID,
bot_id UUID,
message TEXT,
timestamp TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE users (user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
username VARCHAR(50),
email VARCHAR(100),
created_at TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE bots (bot_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
name VARCHAR(50),
description TEXT,
created_at TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE bot_logs (log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
bot_id UUID,
message TEXT,
timestamp TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE conversation_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  bot_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  message TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE interactions (
  interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  log_id INT,
  user_id INT,
  bot_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  response TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE messages (
  message_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  log_id INT,
  user_id INT,
  bot_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  message_text TEXT
);
